most of the people came here after watching dress up darling hope they will make nxt season as soon as poosible

Dress up darling exploded in popularity both in and outside of japan. Not making a season 2 would seem like a dumb move. Though so far there are only 73 chapters (english translated) and Cloverworks so far adapted almost 40 of those chapters. Most likely we would have to wait for more chapters to appear to get a second season.
I think he meant about this anime getting a second season not Dress-Up Darling.
Both are produced by the same exact studio and both have been widely received with nothing but praise around the world. It would be stupid to not give either of them a season 2

could just be me but honestly it seems like akebi-chan has gotten like literally no attention this season from the majority of the anime fan base. I legit know 0 people online atm who is watching this show. I HOPE ofc this gets a s2 but sales and numbers are what matter the most. and akebi is being heavily overshadowed by AOT and Dress up darling this season along with demonslayer earlier too. and i think cloverworks would find it hard to see it as worth it to make a s2. unless the relatively small fanbase it has kills it with bluray sales etc.
How about both then?
